name: To Dice With Death (mrkookoo9)
description:
To Dice With Death is a top-down rogue-like made for the GMTK 2022 game jam.

You play as a monk who hates gambling and is forced into a casino themed arena with enemies that get stronger over time.

Every 5 minutes a dice will be rolled which either makes it harder or easier based on the roll of the dice.

I was very tired while making this cause it was like 3am when they showed the theme and ended at 5am.

Controls:

Escape for settings

W, A, S, D = movement

Click = Fire Weapon

May Update Later.
